website_summaries.verdict: If you need a tablet that can do it all, this model sounds, looks, and performs better than you may expect at this price point.
pros: Great for web browsing and watching videos
cons: Its 7 or 8 hours of usage between charges could be better

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Won't run ANY amazon apps. No Amazon shopping app. No prime video. No Kindle. No Alexa. Amazon customer service sent me to Lenovo. Lenovo customer service sent me to Google. Google customer service sent me to Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thickman

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is annoying to say the least
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pain in the ass to use. The power outlet is on the opposite side from the power button, do if your device is charging, you either have the cord being bent(not good for cord or device), or you hit the power button repeatedly & the device keeps turning off. It doesn't hold a charge for very long & takes forever to charge, do the power cord issue, is a big issue. I really hate my new tablet & I'm super bummed about the waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Several app incompatibility - revised
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has major compatibility problems for multiple apps. May be an Android 9 problem. Issues I have encountered. Include: will not run amazon shopping app and my att app, amazon prime video can be unstable, can develop a shopping cart in Tom Thumb app but can not check out, WiFi drops out sometimes. Suspect I will find more issues. Has good potential, but currently is frustrating. Revised review adds a star. After the latest system software update CBS all access now works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but good luck with Lenovo laptops over the years, so I decided to give their tablet a try. The tablet ships with Android 8.0, but immediately updates to 9.0 when you connect it to WiFi. The tablet is VERY responsive and has a beautiful display, battery life seems good as well. Face recognition work perfectly no matter which way the tablet is orientated and in various lighting conditions. I had no problems installing the various apps I use. I am very happy with my purchase, especially when you compare the price with other tablets of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Casparro

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, slow charging
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a downgrade from Samsung. I have a Lenovo laptop and desktop which are high end, I assumed the same for the tablet. Very slow charging. I charged for 12 hours the first time only to be at 35%, charged the next day about 16 hours only to be at 63%. The screen resolution isn't the greatest but I guess for the price it's good. Awkward placement of the power and volume buttons. All in all outta good for the price at $130 on the Amazon truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, good performance
customer_reviews.text: I need a basic android tablet for my business that would take photos quickly and not be sluggish. I was able to easily download the app I needed. Photos are good and takes 1 second or less to capture image. Another cheaper tablet I sent back last week took at least 6 seconds to capture image from time I clicked and resulted in missing the moment and long wait times, something we do not have time for in a busy environment. The only negative I have found is a short charging cable, but those are cheap so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: TechPro

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. Immediately out of the box it requires a system update, and that system update kills the ability to install or use most applications that I care about. You cannot install or use Amazon apps. There's an extremely annoying Lenovo software launcher that will not go away. I bought this tablet for my daughter to use as a kid's tablet linked through Google family, and while Google family doesn't allow YouTube to be installed on a kid's tablet, the Lenovo launcher that never goes away shows the front page of YouTube including very inappropriate videos for an 8-year-old girl. Also the tablet throws error messages constantly. Lenovo really dropped the ball on this tablet. Strongly recommend you avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to surf the internet and do basic school homework - watch videos, write papers, ect. That being said, it has performed wonderfully thus far. I am very pleased with the size of the screen, the quality of the images, and the battery life. It is lighter than I had anticipated and is comfortable to use. I will write another update in 6 months, but so far I highly recommend this tablet. I got it on sale for Black Friday for around $130.
customer_reviews.author: FJM

customer_reviews.title: No storage, face unlock takes 30 seconds, buggy OS
customer_reviews.text: Sticks in landscape mode, and you can only use the home screen with the device sideways. Storage space is abysmal. Sure, it's got 16gb of storage space, but the pre-installed software on the device takes up all but 6 gigs of that storage. Once you install all your . 5 gb apps, there's no storage left for photos or games. Lame! Doesn't have removable storage, doesn't use usb-C, and the power button and volume button are not where your instinct would lead you to believe. Lame!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dimmadome

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great tablet. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to tune my car. I just wanted a cheap little tablet and had no plans on using it until I used it. WOW! I am a iPad person usually as is my wife, when I showed her she took it and uses it everyday. Like right now. It has a crazy nice display and sound is excellent. It look and sounds better then my 2016 iPad Air 2, excellent battery, fast, we love it. After using this I ordered the Android navigation for my BMW E90 I like this thing so much. Nice Lenovo and great OS. Ordered a $12 leather like stand cover for it. Love it! Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Overall I Recommend This Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet on Treasure Truck, so the price was excellent. The battery life is excellent, the screen is excellent, and the sound is good. Because I'm used to using iOs apps on my iPhone, I'm finding the Google apps a little hard to get used to. One of the apps that I use a lot on my phone tends to crash on this tablet, which is annoying. However, I use this tablet for reading books on Libby and Kindle, which work fine, and for watching videos on Netflix and Prime video. Overall, I recommend this tablet for the price and features.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mairs

customer_reviews.title: SSSSLLLLOOOOOOWWWWWW, useless.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only to browse the internet and take notes with onenote. With nothing on it but Firefox and a fast wifi connection, it is the slowest tablet I have ever used. It reacts to touch and browsing with a 1 second or more delay. I can't use it. I bought a surface tablet and this one will be in a drawer until I throw it away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya!

customer_reviews.title: All That, and then some..
customer_reviews.text: I have a surface and an iPad, this little gadget is the equivalent of marrying the two together. It’s the perfect size and it’s an actual computer that accepts a Bluetooth mouse and keyboard. I added a 256gb sd card for extra storage. I bought my wife one, my mother one, my granddaughter and daughter one. This is a great tablet/computer that allows you to everything you can do on a computer, tablet or phone.
customer_reviews.author: AntBme

customer_reviews.title: A tablet for reading manga/comics/graphic novels
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 10" tablet that ran on Android and was cheap in order to read manga. I found with this Lenovo tablet. It is nothing special but it gets the job done. It has an eye protection mode that I turn on plus I lower the screen brightness to in order my reading comfort. I only use it to read manga scans and occasionally watch a youtube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Spanishfly

customer_reviews.title: Good audio lo rez screen
customer_reviews.text: It has great audio but the screen is a downgrade from the Kindle 10 screen. It's biggest advantage is the Play store for people not interested in the Amazon echo system
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just my experience.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this tablet. It is not a horrible tablet but I have some issues. Like my daughters cheap old tablet lasted all day, this will only last half the day maybe less. For some reason the display tablet I tried was super fast which made me want this tablet without question. Well my tablet is no where near as fast and will lag sometimes. I don't know if these problems are happening to just mine or maybe mines defective but I'm just giving my experience with the Lenovo I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Buy cheap get cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I got it an used it for several months before writing a review. Pros- are that it is a nice device. Ok battery life Nice screen. Cons- are it is severely underpowered. Larger apps like games take too long to load, I even have had trouble loading the play store apps updates section. I hoped Lenveno would be less IBM like but it is still cheapest parts making it frustratingly difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: The price was right, but lacking in CPU and RAM
customer_reviews.text: The price was awesome at just over $100. Build quality also meets my expectations. However, I regret my purchase and wish I had chosen a different model with a faster processor and more memory. The tablet is slow, already out of space, and I'm constantly sitting patiently waiting for the CPU to catch up with my actions. This is especially true if you plan on sharing this tablet and utilizing the multiple account features. My attempt to save money will now cost me more in the long run. Shared among two adults, this tablet is virtually useless solely because of its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Planecrash

customer_reviews.title: Unresolved technical issues with the UI
customer_reviews.text: The User Interface app on this tablet fails constantly and Lenovo offers no fix for it. If you plan on using apps that require tapping or typing you will encounter this problem frequently. It generally requires a restart to resolve. There are times when it seems like I spend more time restarting it, than actually using it. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Benn Mc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent $99 tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet for the money. I've been using a Lenovo desktop computer for 10 years without a lick of trouble, so I trust Lenovo. I bought this tablet to replace a previous model TB-X304F that still works perfectly but I slammed the car door on it. Tough to look through shattered glass. Incomplete product info: Under "Compare with similar items", Bluetooth is not listed, but the M10 does, indeed, have Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J Gran

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget your login pin or you are out of luck.
customer_reviews.text: I set up the login when I received the Tab. I didn’t have WiFi for a couple of weeks after. When I got back on the net, I was going to use it. I could not remember the 4 character pin to login. I tried 30 different combos of numbers, with no success. Wrote Lenevo support several times to see if there was a way to reset the device. The few answers I received were not helpful at all. So, the device is useless to me now.
customer_reviews.author: James Bittel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this tablet. Tablet has a beautiful clear screen. It operates very fast. There is slow down when handling multiple tasks like downloads and games at the same time. For the price that's excusable. This tablet is perfect for watching movies, enjoying your favorite app, browsing the internet, or creating a doc for work. Speakers are pound and clear. WiFi and Bluetooth run fast with no dropping issues. I benchmark tested mine. It has the specs as described. You will not find a better tablet without paying a lot more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justinmh1634

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Battery
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these tablets for my kids (7 and 9 years) to replace older ones. I made my purchase in May 2020 and one was incredible flimsy and the screen cracked while being held. In the other one the battery no longer holds a charge and does not recharge when plugged in. My son has been using his from July until September. I even found the original Lenovo charger and cord and it still won't charge. As for the operating system this tablet does not facilitate file transfers very well and won't let you insert SD cards without formatting (which means I can't transferred files via SD card.) I recommend purchasing a different tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramy

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda Bought a Fire Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I checked around and this tablet got good reviews. My wife wanted a tablet so I purchased this for her. She couldn't really figure it out, and when I played with it for awhile, I wasn't too keen on it either, and I'm pretty computer savvy. We both own Apple Mac Pro computers so maybe we are spoiled? I ended up getting her a 10" Fire Tablet and it is MUCH MORE USER FRIENDLY. FWIW that's my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for streaming & games, not much else
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this tablet more. The Lenovo interface gets in it's way and I find that many apps don't function very well. The battery life is outstanding and the speakers are great. If you're looking for a tablet for streaming, this is a great investment. I was looking for more, so I'm not as happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: OLIVIA MCKINSEY

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought a fire tablet but was very disappointed with its OS, lack of apps and connectivity performance. Found this larger Lenovo for only a few bucks more and man, do I love it!! Very intuitive/easy to navigate, sharper resolution, more robust and capable in every way. Highly recommended— you won’t be disappointed for the price (and this, coming fm a long-time Apple user ;-)
customer_reviews.author: LRey007

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tablet that constantly restarts itself on random
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of time and money.... constantly crashes and restarts itself, no matter what function or application you’re using at the time. Alongside that It randomly enters and exits safe mode, i get error screens constantly. When I reach out to the company regarding the malfunctioning of the product they responded with a try to set it back to factory settings..... so deleting all the settings I did to the tablet and now I lose all of it, with no guarantee of it fixing the issue. No thank you.... I’m in the process of returning it and you will be too if you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: hania363

customer_reviews.title: Seemed Nice but Hurt My Eyes
customer_reviews.text: It seemed nice but something about the screen hurt my eyes after about 20 minutes of using it. I've had other tablets before and never had this problem, so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia U.

customer_reviews.title: Treasure truck find
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when it was on the treasure truck and works great for what we need. It's not the most amazing tablet out there but we bought for the sole purpose of having it for casting to our chromecast. It's very handy to just have it in the living room when we want to watch something but don't want to get up to get our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Tablet with the most elusive cover
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the tablet! Why is it so hard to find a cover that is made for it? I have tried several third-party covers/cases and they all sucked! Come on man, get a dedicated case so people can protect their investment! Would have rated 5 stars, but I rarely even use it out of fear of breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap tablet. Doesn’t work with anything, including Amazon Prime/Retail. Glad I didn’t spend too much money because this thing is buggy. Doesn’t recognize different users. And support is atrocious.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Wow can't beat this!
customer_reviews.text: The price on this tablet is amazing... and the storage is expandable.... I can't believe I found this buy. The price is low and the quality is high. Is it the most powerful tablet... Of course not, but that is not what it was designed to be.. You can find faster, better screens, more storage, etc.. but not anywhere near this price.. This is a perfect family tablet. Great for ebooks, media, games, videos, social media, and much much more.. If you are in the market for a simpler tablet for you or the family.. don't pass this one up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Canup Jr

customer_reviews.title: Old technology
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon Warehouse, it is old technology (so am I) there is not much storage space for someone that needs it,I added a sd card,and I use a external hard drive,that gives it enough to store a city bus,I really like it,but I am just using for inter net surfing and the occasional download which I send to the external drive,if you need a high powered up to date tablet, this ain't it
customer_reviews.author: Danis M. Whiles

customer_reviews.title: Just Leave Lenovo Behind
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save some money and re-learned the old saw about getting what you pay for. Spent hours loading all my favorite websites and apps only to have them disappear every time the device was turned off and restarted. Apparently, this itsy, bitsy defect is known to Lenovo and has no ready fix. Great! Will spend a little more and try to remember next time not to scrimp on such devices.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Missing a feature or two.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit to replace my old Samsung unit that was stuck at Android 4. The Lenovo has version 9 and Bluetooth in addition to WiFi AC. However, it does not have a 'flash' LED for the rear camera. It's implementation of the Android OS is different from the Samsung. For example, the camera seems to take continuous pictures if the 'shutter button' is held down and I can't find a way to change it.
customer_reviews.author: George R Mells

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I needed. Did not use long enough to rate actual quality
customer_reviews.text: The Google system loaded on this tablet rendered it useless for me. There was no way to navigate anything online without using voice and for what I needed this table for that does not work at all. I tried disabling the voice setting and looked up numerous suggestions on how to change the set up and in the end I could not get a keyboard to pop up to type in what I wanted. The size, weight and resolution was great but had to return this tablet. Disappointed because I need two tablets for my business applications and the price was right. Still looking for what I need...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed right out of the box, it runs poorly and the android OS is difficult. Google play store purchases and in-app purchases are taking me into day two of trouble shooting. Pro: it’s cheap Con: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: cjohnson596

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly decent tablets. Purchased them for work and they are fast and do well for what we use them for. The major problem is the one is already broken even though It was stored in a case and didn’t experience much of a drop. My son puts his iPad through more abuse in a case and it is still in great condition. I guess you get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Charging time
customer_reviews.text: If there was a rating worse than 1 then this device deserts it; I tried to charge it, plugged for over 72hrs (3 days) yet it did not get fully charged. I called Amazon for a return but they redirected that I contact Lenovo (product OEM) for exchange as it was still under warranty. Lenovo didn't replace but rather repaired the same device and sent back. hence I now have a repaired device based on a day 1 fault. needless to say, the charging system is still running for outrageous hours. The quality of repair details provided by the repair centre was another activity that deserves a 0 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Seun Oyeyemi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I got the upgraded 32 gb version. There is no sd card slot on this version so you'd be better off getting the base model and adding your own sd card. You can get more this way. Wish it specified that.
customer_reviews.author: lostintime

customer_reviews.title: Good kids tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good for price. A little hard for my 3 year old to get the hang on the soft home button. External buttons on the side for volume and sleep are a little difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tash Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Display and Screen size
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you login to your Google account at setup you get 2 Android 9.0 updates hopefully we will get updated to Android 10. Only issue is that some apps are not compatible with Android 9.0 yet but that's not Lenovo fault the app Manufactures are behind on there updates. The only Lenovo app issue I have is that there is no way to have the Weather widget on the home screen refresh automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: garbage. had the tablet 60 days and its stuck in a bootloop and is a useless paperweight now. Tried all trouble shooting. Very angry at how much money this cost for a 2 month tablet service essentially call Lenovo support and there's no option to even get to a person to get it repaired. tried every option and they have no concern for this nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Megan dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a great buy. Got it as a Christmas gift for my baby nephew. My sister has given this rave reviews for ease of set up and parental controls. She even called me via Google Duo - which is Google's facetime - and it was really clear. The picture quality was very bright and clear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Saira

customer_reviews.title: Just OKAY
customer_reviews.text: Overall just ok. The product works as it should. I am not a power user, just internet use and YouTube. The lack of armored cases for this model in a negative. And the charging port is very poorly designed. It makes the micro usb plug way too easy to insert wrong and cause damage.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bought new Used was delivered  - Shipped with someone else data
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to run 1 app for my guitar amplifier. For the money ($139.00) wasn't bad. I was not aware I was getting a used item with someone else data on it and a scratched screen. It will work for what I need it to do but sad that it was advertised as new but I received used
customer_reviews.author: testedone

customer_reviews.title: Newer Model of the Lenovo Tab 4 Series.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Lenovo's Tab 4 series and I believe this one is the newer version of Lenovo's Tab 4 series, even though it is called the Tab M series. This is a fantastic tablet and really great value for money. Great for content consumption and the great battery life helps keep my kids entertained on long drives.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Splurge for a better tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is awful. It constantly crashes and locks up when I try to use it. As soon as possible, I am purchasing a better quality tablet for myself. I get so frustrated with this tablet that I can't do simple things like check email or Facebook. It locks up every time. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my dad to introduce him to technology, we will see how that goes. I set it up and played with it a while and it is a good tablet. Wish they didn't put so much bs on the tablet that you cannot delete but Came exactly as expected. Good Product Overall.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it won't auto rotate. The charging port is on the bottom. A real nuisance when you are using it and have to charge at the same time. I suspect that it won't be long be long before the place you plug the charging cord into on the tablet fails because of that one issue. It's already wobbly with average use.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Set up for tablet is a bit obscure
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months of use the mechanical connection to the power supply/charger malfunctioned. Finding a service center was a bit of a challenge and returning tablet for new one is limited. Be very careful as you plug in charger that you don't bend the metal tab by forcing plug into port. We were careful and still it malfunctioned. If it could be fixed while under warrantee is still a question I can't get answered. High on the frustration level. When it worked it was great, good color, good response and puchased additional keyboard worked well as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I got this off the Treasure Truck so it was a good value to start with but I have enjoyed it a lot. I keep it in the den by the TV so I can look up stuff I see on the tube and it has been a great toy. I would certainly recommend it for anyone looking for a smaller tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five enthusiastic stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my new Lenovo tablet!! The bigger size is great for my vision, it is fast and easy to use. I had looked at the top manufacturer of mobile products first, but the price tag has much bigger than I expected. I live on a fixed income and I could not see spending that much. So, I landed on Lenovo. What a great product for the money!! Lenovo is at the top of my list when I need a new tablet!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Its a tablet.. nothing outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We got it from the treasure truck. We wanted to see what is shopping through a treasure truck is all about. The tablet... its a tablet... nothing really outstanding except for ita price during treasure truck offering.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few years my family and I have had several tablets made by HP, Samsung and others. By far this is the best. Great performance including no video lag when gaming. The screen images are super sharp and clear. I would mos definitely recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Rodbuilder

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and it is working great. Note that I got it for $123, and at that price it is well worth it. I would probably still buy it at $175 over something like a walmart onn tablet or a fire tablet, but if you can get it for less than $175 then jump on it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a Christmas gift for my mother and she says she really loves this more than her Apple Ipad. She said its fast and the functionality does exactly what she needs. I wish I could give more specifics but I will be purchasing one later on also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Some of my IT friends suggested this for someone that is not really computer literate. Easy to use, and little worries about hacker's and spam. Plus, all of the schools here use it at school, so your school age children can do their homework on it, and maybe train you how to use it! lol Bought it for a friend that is in his 50's and never has used a computer. You have to start somewhere :)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is for my mother to replace a cheaper off-brand tablet that only lasted just over two years. She uses it for Facebook, email, reading magazines and playing card & casino games. Mom LOVES this tablet. Graphics are great and battery lasts the entire day--often outlasts her. I would definitely recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charging Ports
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old twins. They love them! Unfortunately, we can no longer get the tablets to charge. Trying to contact Lenovo to place a warranty claim is apparently top secret. If anyone knows how to contact Lenovo, please let me know. Other than that, we love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie langer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. I returned it the next day after purchase. The tablet never charged. Turned on once and it was extremely slow. Even tried to leave it charging over night and it never worked. Do not purchase this
customer_reviews.author: Lorena juarez

customer_reviews.title: Umh
customer_reviews.text: There were No Logo on the item to say it was legit.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy for a very useful tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this tablet. The battery lasts forever. I most frequently use it to provide the music for the store where I work, using Pandora, Apple Music, and YouTube via WiFi and communicating with the store's sound system via Bluetooth, and 6 or 7 hours of continuous play doesn't even use 20% of the battery charge. Lately I've taken to watching things on Netflix and Prime Video in bed like a second TV. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value but slower than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Slow to connect to my home high-speed wifi, also noticeably slower processing speed than I would expect from a modern tablet. Overall I'm content as it is 1/4 the price of a Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Michael Magallon

customer_reviews.title: Loving this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Does what I wanted it too, great battery life, light weight, thin profile. Everything I could ask for. If I had one complaint it would be the ludicrously short charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice device!!
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet for the price! It has several Nice features! The battery lasts a long time whether watching videos, playing games, or just surfing the web. I really like this device & definitely recommend it over many other brands of similar size, features, & price range!
customer_reviews.author: Killerwatt

customer_reviews.title: Screen Cracked
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a little slow, which would have been find, however, when I went to lay it on a table somehow I held it wrong and the screen cracked before I even made it to the table. Not sure if this one was faulty or if they are made like that. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tomchick

customer_reviews.title: Very good,...read exception
customer_reviews.text: Great partner to my better Lenovo 10" tablet. EXCEPT bluetooth cuts in & out. Lenovo no help on phone. " we dont provide help on phone."
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a bedside clock radio
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for time and temp, alarm, timer, podcasts, audiobooks, movies, music, ebooks... all right there on my nightstand. Like a clock radio on steroids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: Lenovo makes a good performing, quality tablet that has all the features that Android offers. Battery life is good and the screen is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Rehab and OccMed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet. No problems so for. Still learning it capabilities. I checked YouTube and Google for a User Tutorial. Didn't find anything, only how to open and turn on. Nothing on the features. Wish there was a tutorial.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I think this is a good unit. 100 bucks. I'm coming from an old iPad and this suits my Android ecosystem. So it's nice, everything syncs up.
customer_reviews.author: F. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Charging socket is bust after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of those as I thought Lenovo was somewhat good quality. While the tablet itself is serving its purpose well, we can barely use it, as only 3 months after purchasing it. the charging socket is hardly working. Only a very specific angle of the charger will charge it. This is really frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: oren

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT like the Lenono tablet
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be easy using this tablet but it's slow and sto different from my Trio AXS. I'm thinking of returning the Lenono and going back to what I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Newton

customer_reviews.title: Didn't need a lot, and this tablet serves.
customer_reviews.text: Got this from Amazon Treasure Truck. I needed an inexpensive tablet for nothing more complicated that viewing PDFs, and for that this one work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. P. T.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a dedicated monitor for my rowing machine and IFit app. It's a big step up from my phone. I was a little disappointed when I kept getting compatibility error messages. These all went away after the tablet automatically updated. I'm very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Z

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great price and usability. Out of the box user friendly and compatible with all apps. All the functionality of a Samsung without high price tag. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maura E. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very fast running device. To be so small . I got two iPads. This machine. Is much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Greg cooper

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for me. I couldn't be happier with it. The tablet works great. Battery life is excellent. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't install Amazon apps, even after update
customer_reviews.text: I was uable to install the Kindle app, even after updating the system and factory reset. A tablet without Amazon app capabilities isn't really useful at our house, so it's going back. It's ashame, it's a nice tablet otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: monica flores

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Being a Samsung kid, I was skeptical of other brands. I am very satisfied with my purchase. It does what I need it to do and that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: App icons
customer_reviews.text: Glitchy out of box. Updated to Android 9. Installed Amazon and other apps, was a struggle at first, update may have helped. But once apps installed, no way to add icon? Some do, half don't. Never seen this problem before, most concerning is lack of response by Lenova. Multiple people asking this question.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good write up.
customer_reviews.text: Good thing I didn't throw away my USB cords. Looks pretty good so far. Don't need it to do anything fancy. Just solid reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Mother's day gift and bit was I happy when she was able to hook it up on her own. She uses it every day! What a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Chipawa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of power and cost
customer_reviews.text: I like that this tablet its fast. No bloatwear, has android 9. The battery is long lasting. I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer  Southeastern TN

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: On a scale from 1 to 10 I give it a not bad however it was not worth the drive all the way up to that Amazon truck to get it
customer_reviews.author: antoinne barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tablet. It’s my first android device and so easy to use. Very clear graphics, sound is good. Glad I was gifted this for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, good screen. A little quirky with my internet. Sometimes have to go all the way into settings and turn WiFi off and back on for it to see the internet. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this 3 months and it is horrible. Nothing downloads, takes hours to charge, and charge only holds for an hour. Obviously I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I only purchase Lenovo tablets. They are long lasting and very reasonably priced. I had my last tablet for 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Slower Than a DOS PC
customer_reviews.text: This is slower than the Pc's in the 80s. Cheap, but you get what you pay for. I love lenovo's, but this... SKIP IT
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley Maragh

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Within the first two weeks of ownership the keyboard disappeared. After some internet research I had to update the operating system and the keyboard came back. Once I shut off all of the intrusive tracking from Chrome the tablet seems to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love the graphics, the brightness, the color, the speed, and I still have Microsoft 365 on this tablet...
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Lenovo tablet. My 1st one I had for over 7 years . As far as I'm concerned Lenovo is the best tablet out there! I have bought other tablets and within a few months they started having problems. Lenovo is by far the best brand out there and I will always by their brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Dash

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This has Android 9, which is up to date if you buy other expensive used tablet they would have old Android os, which cannot play certain games.
customer_reviews.author: John song

customer_reviews.title: Beware of faulty charging sucket
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit beginning of April 2020 and after less than 4 months of not heavy use, the issuesstarted. Sometimes it takes about 8 hours to completely charge......and then the charger socket got busted..... now you have to play with the charger wire to find a position to charge the device, and then wait about 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP and Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Plastic everything. Right down to the operating system. Very very cheap product, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Grrat Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend. She has told me numerous times how pleased she is with her tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has a nice screen and good sound quality. The android os was different than most android os’s I’ve used but was easy to learn and is good. the front and back cams on this Tab are a bit grainy. Not something I would want on my phone. However with good lighting the photos might be good enough for you.
customer_reviews.author: zach f.

customer_reviews.title: Not data compatible
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I didn't like this product as much as it wasn't suitable to my needs. It is strictly WiFi; I need a device that allows for data.
customer_reviews.author: gerarama

product_meta.title: Lenovo Tab M10 HD 10.1" Tablet, Android 9.0, 32GB Storage, Quad-Core Processor, WiFi, Bluetooth, ZA4G0078US, Slate Black
product_meta.description:
Style:32GB ROMThe Lenovo Tab M10 (HD) is one impressive Android™ tablet – and made for the whole family! This impressive 10-inch tablet features an HD screen and two front speakers with Dolby Audio™ (plus a 3.5 mm audio jack) to make streaming videos, games, and other applications come to life. Packed with a powerful Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 429, quad-core, 2.0GHz processor, the Tab M10 offers 32GB memory and microSD™ card slot to add more. It supports fast connection with true 2.4 GHz/5 GHz Wi-Fi dual bands (WLAN 802.11a/b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth® 4.2, and a Micro USB port. Plus, you can put your mind at ease with the special kid's mode, containing custom content and protection features so your children can use this Android™ tablet without the worry. 

Thin, light, and ready to go when you are, the Tab M10 (HD) delivers up to 8 hours of video playback time on the 1280x800 resolution 10.1" HD screen. Front and rear cameras let you take photos and connect with family and friends no matter where you are. And with facial recognition technology, you can unlock your device quickly and conveniently.
feature_bullets: The Lenovo Tab M10 (HD) is one impressive family tablet; It is packed with powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 429, quad core, 2.0 GHz and supports fast connection with true 2.4 GHz/5 GHz WiFi Dual bands
Inside lies an impressive 10.1” HD screen and dual front speakers for immersive entertainment impossibly contained within an extremely thin and light profile with rich sounds and visuals
Plus, make it truly family-friendly by adding kids pack and stylish folio case so lend it to your child, worry free
This is one tablet you'll want to pass around the house; Add up to 256 micro SD additional storage to have everything you need all on your tablet
A family friendly tablet with face recognition to unlock your tablet with multiple user profiles and pre-loaded kids mode gives you peace of mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,489 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
